DOC.brief_title: Nicotine Replacement Smoking Cessation During Pregnancy
DOC.detailed_description: This project examine safety efficacy nicotine inhaler aid smoking cessation pregnancy . The specific aim : ( 1 ) To examine efficacy nicotine inhaler compare match placebo smoke cessation pregnancy ; ( 2 ) To compare nicotine inhaler placebo overall nicotine exposure ( i.e. , serum cotinine concentration ) , birth outcome ( i.e. , birth weight gestational age ) ; ( 3 ) To identify factor determine woman benefit use nicotine inhaler smoking cessation pregnancy ; ( 4 ) To explore mechanism nicotine inhaler increase birth weight gestational age . Subjects recruit two prenatal clinic serve primarily low-income , minority population . Pregnant smoker ( n=270 ) smoke least 5 cigarettes/ day receive nurse-delivered behavioral counseling randomize receive 6-week course treatment either nicotine inhaler placebo , follow 6-week taper .
